00130         // discvalue not set here
00131 
00132         if(!recoilP.empty()){

00134             recoilPy_ = recoilP[1]; 
00135             recoilPz_ = recoilP[2];
00136             recoilX_ = recoilPos[0]; 
00137             recoilY_ = recoilPos[1]; 
00138         }
00139
